title: What's Up With Philanthropy Today
description: Melissa Berman, founding president and CEO of Rockefeller Philanthropy Advisors, and Olga Tarasov, director, knowledge development, at RPA, will speak with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about what’s going on with philanthropy today and a tool they’ve developed to guide donors in being more effective.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Melissa Berman, founding president and CEO of Rockefeller Philanthropy Advisors, and Olga Tarasov, director, knowledge development, at RPA, will speak with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about what’s going on with philanthropy today and a tool they’ve developed to guide donors in being more effective.
content:encoded: Melissa Berman, founding president and CEO of Rockefeller Philanthropy Advisors, and Olga Tarasov, director, knowledge development, at RPA, will speak with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about what’s going on with philanthropy today and a tool they’ve developed to guide donors in being more effective.
